label: Hidden->Active observation boundary
pythonCode:
from core.FormulasRegistry import get_registry
reg = get_registry()

# Values from SSoT
ROOTS = reg.roots_total       # 288
hidden = reg.sterile_sector   # 163
visible = reg.visible_sector  # 125

# Decoherence: Quantum -> Classical transition
# 163 hidden roots form decoherence bath
# Observation boundary at 125/163 interface

decoherence_ratio = hidden / visible  # 163/125 = 1.304
note: Hidden->Active observation boundary determines quantum-to-classical transition
